descriptions.text:
STRAWBERRY - LAGOON 440 (2008 | REFIT 2026) | YOUR SPACIOUS IONIAN SEA ESCAPE

EFFORTLESS CRUISING & TWIN-HULL STABILITY

With her 25 ft beam and shallow 4 ft draft, the Lagoon 440 offers exceptional stability and freedom to explore the Ionian’s hidden coves. 
The twin 54 hp engines ensure smooth manoeuvring even in tight harbours — ideal whether you’re a seasoned sailor or new to multihulls.

GENEROUS LIVING AREAS & LIGHT-FILLED INTERIORS

Her four-cabin, four-bath configuration comfortably accommodates up to 10 guests (8 in dedicated cabins + 2 on the convertible saloon bed). 
Panoramic windows flood the interior with light, while the open-plan salon and galley provide the perfect setting for shared meals, socialising or simply relaxing after a day on the water.

PERFECT FOR BOTH EXPERIENCED SAILORS & HOLIDAY SEEKERS

Equipped with full-batten mainsail, furling genoa, electric winch and solar panels, this Lagoon 440 is ready for genuine sailing adventures. At the same time, the generous cockpit, swim platform and sun-pads make it perfect for a relaxed holiday with family or friends.

COMFORT & STYLE IN EVERY DETAIL

Expect premium touches: espresso machine, well-equipped galley, high-quality linens, fans in cabins, USB & 220 V plugs, a modern sound-system and more. With upgrades (refit 2026) incorporated, she seamlessly blends charter-practical features with luxury-yacht feel.

FREE SERVICES & EXTRAS BECAUSE EVERY SUMMER IS YOLO

On board you’ll find complimentary snorkeling gear, a dinghy with outboard engine, and floating sternlines for easy mooring. All designed to enhance your holiday experience — less hassle, more freedom.

Book your week of freedom, sun & sea. Your adventure starts here!

Follow us on Instagram: @yolo_charters
Find us on Facebook: Yolo Charters – Discover The Ionian Sea

descriptions.text:
AQUILO - BAVARIA CRUISER 46 (2014) | YOUR PERFECT IONIAN SAILING GETAWAY

Set sail aboard Aquilo, a Bavaria Cruiser 46 built for those who seek both authentic sailing performance and the comfort of home at sea. With four spacious cabins and room for up to 10 guests (8 + 2), she?s the perfect choice whether you?re a passionate sailor or simply looking to unwind under the Ionian sun with family and friends.

SMOOTH PERFORMANCE & EASY HANDLING

Powered by a 55 hp engine and featuring bow thruster, autopilot, and rolling mainsail, Aquilo offers effortless control and smooth manoeuvring even in narrow harbours.
Her beam of 14.2 ft and draft of just 6.9 ft provide ideal stability and freedom to explore the Ionian's most secluded coves - confidently and comfortably.

BRIGHT, WELCOMING INTERIORS

Step below deck and discover a bright, open space designed for relaxed living.
Panoramic windows flood the salon with natural light, while the well-equipped galley with oven, refrigerator, coffee machine, and kitchen utensils invites you to prepare meals to share with your crew.
Each of the four cabins offers privacy and comfort, complemented by three electric toilets, fresh linens, pillows, and towels - all ready for your journey.

RELAX & UNWIND ON DECK

The spacious cockpit, bimini, and wide bathing platform create the perfect outdoor area for sunbathing, swimming, or enjoying sunset drinks with your favorite people.
A dinghy with outboard, solar panels, and inverter ensure independence and eco-friendly cruising, while the outside speakers, flat-screen TV, and audio system set the mood for every evening onboard.


FREE AMENITIES - BECAUSE EVERY SUMMER IS YOLO

Enjoy free SUP , a complimentary outboard engine, and a Nespresso coffee machine - crafted to make every summer moment unforgettable.

Book your week of freedom, sun & sea. Your adventure starts here!


Follow us on Instagram: @yolo_charters
Find us on Facebook: Yolo Charters – Discover The Ionian Sea

descriptions.text:
LEMON – JEANNEAU SUN ODYSSEY 469 | REFIT 2025 | YOUR PERFECT SUMMER ESCAPE

Set sail on Lemon, a Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 469 designed for those who crave the perfect balance of comfort, style, and adventure. With 4 spacious cabins, it’s the ideal yacht for both experienced sailors and those looking to try sailing for the first time in complete comfort.

EFFORTLESS SAILING & SMOOTH PERFORMANCE

Sleek, fast, and stable, this yacht glides through the water effortlessly, making every journey smooth and enjoyable. The twin helms and easy sail handling let you embrace the thrill of sailing while enjoying a stress-free experience.

SPACIOUS, LIGHT-FILLED INTERIORS

Inside, large panoramic windows flood the space with natural light, creating an inviting, airy atmosphere. The open-plan salon and galley provide the perfect setting for shared meals and unforgettable moments at sea. Each cabin has its own private bathroom, ensuring comfort and privacy for all guests.

DESIGNED FOR PURE RELAXATION

Lemon is a wide and well-balanced yacht with generously sized spaces that invite you to relax. The large cockpit is built for easy lounging, and the swim platform gives you direct access to the refreshing blue waters. Comfortable sun pads at both the bow and the aft let you enjoy the Ionian sunshine in total bliss. Whether you're sunbathing, island-hopping, or enjoying sunset drinks on deck, Lemon offers the ultimate sailing escape.

COMFORT & STYLE IN EVERY DETAIL

Enjoy an espresso from the machine or a classic brew from the coffee makers on board — Lemon caters to every taste. The fully equipped galley has everything you need, from cooking utensils to premium cotton bed linen, specially designed for the yacht and embroidered with its name.

SMART, ECO-FRIENDLY ENERGY

Solar panels integrated into the bimini simplify your day-to-day life at sea, providing clean energy throughout your journey. The yacht also features an electric outboard engine that both skippers and guests have praised for its smooth performance. A brand-new, spacious dinghy awaits for your shore explorations.

FREE AMENITIES – BECAUSE EVERY SUMMER IS YOLO

We offer free SUP snorkeling equipment,  a free electric outboard engine, and two 50m floating stern lines — all to make your holiday completely carefree.

Book your week of freedom, sun & sea. Your adventure starts here!

Follow us on Instagram: @yolo_charters
Find us on Facebook: Yolo Charters – Discover The Ionian Sea
